content:
As a result of the successful work of one of the SCO units per day on Ukrainian lands, less than 25 invaders and 6 units of Russian equipment.

About thisinformsCommand of Special Operations forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

As it is noted, in the area of responsibility of the 8th Regiment of the SCO during the period of intelligence, the technique and live forces of the enemy were revealed. The decision to use FPV-oules is made.

According to the results of the SCO units, 2 tanks, Sunpsyk and 3 BBM were damaged and disrupted.

In addition, 13 and 12 invaders were wounded.

"It was a very difficult day, and at the same time-productive, I did not leave the remote longer as a couple of minutes,"-said the operator of the 8th Regiment of the SCO.

We will remind, on the left bank of the Dnieper our unitsneutralizedMore than 40 Russians and 4 observation points.

As reported by the Armyinform, 45 units of Russian equipment are destroyedIn the Tavriya directionfor the age.
title: Warriors of SCO work: "Sunpsyok", 2 tanks, 3 BBM and 26 occupiers now fertilizers
description: This was reported by the Command of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.  As noted, in...
author: Army Inform
